[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” full_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1676860321549{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-image: url(https://pakmagnesia.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/about-banner.jpg?id=146) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”specialist”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1674955415272{padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Who We Are” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:35px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:43px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]At PAK MINERALS & REFRACTORY INDUSTRY (PMRI), we take pride in our brand Pak-Magnesia®, which is recognized globally for its quality and reliability. We are a certified ISO 9001:2015, QA INTERNATIONAL CERTIFICATION LIMITED, committed to producing and supplying the finest Light Burnt Magnesium Oxide (CCM Magnesia) available. Our state-of-the-art processing plants located in Karachi Sindh, Pakistan, enable us to cater to a diverse customer base, both locally and internationally.

Pak-Magnesia offers a wide variety of magnesia products to meet the needs of customers both in Pakistan and around the world. With our unmatched applications expertise and the broadest product mix available. We are uniquely positioned to satisfy almost all end-use demands.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1676849658186{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;}” el_class=”about-home”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1674875971273{padding-right: 100px !important;padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Mission Statement” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|color:%231e66a6|line_height:38px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

At Pak Magnesia, our goal is to contribute to a better world by producing environmentally friendly magnesia-based products. Our culture, values, and beliefs drive us to continuously improve and challenge ourselves.

Magnesia is a crucial mineral with numerous benefits, leading to its increasing usage and growth in related industries worldwide.

With our focus on sustainability and high-quality standards, we aim to become the largest supplier in the magnesia market globally.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1676849900808{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #1e66a6 !important;}” el_class=”about-home”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1674875971273{padding-right: 100px !important;padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”History” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:38px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Pak Magnesia, a subsidiary of PMRI, is a business venture of the JSE Group of Companies. JSE Group has been a prominent player in the pipe industry in Pakistan since its inception in 1980, and today it exports pipes of varying grades and sizes to multiple countries globally.

Apart from pipes, JSE Group specializes in diverse fields such as civil construction, water treatment systems, and the manufacturing of various metal and steel products. The company has a skilled team of technical experts who are adept at taking calculated risks and capitalizing on opportunities in a fiercely competitive market.

With the increasing significance of magnesia products and extensive research and development efforts, JSE Group recognized the need to expand its portfolio. As a result, the company decided to establish a separate line of business that would focus on magnesia-based products, leading to the formation of Pak Magnesia.

New Solutions” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:35px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:43px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Next to our expertise in mineral exploration, mining, processing and delivering high quality magnesite products, we do a lot of R&D work. We place special emphasis on research and development and our dedicated R&D center has been operating for the last 3 decades. Our R&D plays a critical role in delivering and shaping corporate strategy by combining market input with scientific insights to improve existing products and develop innovative and high added value products.

Pak Magnesia is committed to the philosophy of “Kaizen,” which involves incremental improvements from the bottom up. Our team is empowered to drive changes, learning, and process improvements on the factory floor to optimize efficiency and effectiveness.
We value a culture of learning and prioritize investments in R&D to improve our processes, procedures, and product development. Our team is always eager to adopt the latest industry advancements and practices, which is reflected in the superior quality of our products.

R&D Center

Our factory premises houses a modern R&D center equipped with cutting-edge instruments and apparatus. We have assembled a team of highly qualified and skilled chemists, analysts, and engineers who are committed to carrying out research aimed at enhancing our process and product improvement techniques, with a view to improving the quality of our final products and adding value for our customers. In addition to product development, our R&D team also provides technical support and after-sales service to our valued customers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
